message: Let's be fair and split the money, with a slight advantage for me to start. This ensures we both benefit from reaching an agreement quickly.
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. We both have a chance to make a good profit if we reach an agreement quickly.
I appreciate the idea of a fair split, but the time pressure is on me more than you.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile.
